verses.verse: Thus said <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Go <S%H1980><s%>, and buy <S%H7069><s%> a potter <S%H3335><s%>'s earthen <S%H2789><s%> bottle <S%H1228><s%>, and take of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, and of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%>;

and shalt say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>: Even so <S%H3602><s%> will I break <S%H7665><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%> and this city <S%H5892><s%>, as one breaketh <S%H7665><s%> a potter <S%H3335><s%>'s vessel <S%H3627><s%>, that cannot <S%H3201><s%> be made whole again <S%H7495><s%>; and they shall bury <S%H6912><s%> in Topheth <S%H8612><s%>, till there be no place <S%H4725><s%> to bury <S%H6912><s%>.

Thus will I do <S%H6213><s%> unto this place <S%H4725><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and to the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> thereof <S%H5414><s%>, even making this city <S%H5892><s%> as Topheth <S%H8612><s%>:

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Behold <S%H935><s%>, I will bring upon this city <S%H5892><s%> and upon all its towns <S%H5892><s%> all the evil <S%H7451><s%> that I have pronounced <S%H1696><s%> against it <S%H6203><s%>; because they have made their neck stiff <S%H7185><s%>, that they may not hear <S%H8085><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%>.
